formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda
Ballad of The Goddess
description:
See The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword Main Theme performed by a full orchestra in 3D*. This and other songs were included on a CD packed with the Legend of Zelda™: Skyward Sword on the Wii™ console, released in Dec. 2011.

*This video was also available via the Nintendo Video application in 2011.
name:
The Legend of Zelda
Ballad of The Goddess
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
